title: Update Beneficiary on Investment Account
description: A client wants to add their newborn child as a beneficiary on their investment account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the client and retrieve their account details.
Collect the new beneficiary's information (name, date of birth, relationship).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the details for the new beneficiary.

tasks.description: Update the beneficiary designations on the client's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new beneficiary to the account records.
